cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Financial Services on May 17, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7734, Timely Delivery of Bank Secrecy Act Reports Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 81 (Thursday, May 12, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 7734.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H4920]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: Timely Delivery of Bank Secrecy Act Reports Act
